citations.narrative:
Storage. There are two bags of open bedding stored on the floor of the kennel. Open food and bedding must be stored in
a manner that protects supplies from spoilage, contamination, and pests. Licensee must ensure that open bags of
bedding are stored in leakproof containers with lids to protect supplies from contamination and pests. Correct by April 24,
2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.1(e) 
   
Housing facilities, general. 
Storage. There are two bags of open bedding stored on the floor of the kennel. Open food and bedding must be stored in 
a manner that protects supplies from spoilage, contamination, and pests. Licensee must ensure that open bags of 
bedding are stored in leakproof containers with lids to protect supplies from contamination and pests. Correct by April 24, 
2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
